snippet: The participation rate leaves just a small group of investors who might sue over the deal.
abstract: Greece says 97 percent of the investors holding its private sector bonds agree to the terms of a debt swap in which they would take a 75 percent loss in return for a new package of debt securities.
lead_paragraph: The participation rate leaves just a small group of investors who might sue over the deal.

headline.seo: Greece Says 97 Percent of Bondholders Agree to Swap
headline.main: 97% of Investors Agree to Greek Debt Swap
headline.print_headline: 97% of Investors Agree to Greek Debt Swap
